00062 Master::Master(PropertiesPtr &props, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00063                ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue)
00064   : m_props_ptr(props), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr),
00065     m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_verbose(false), m_dfs_client(0),
00066     m_initialized(false) {
00067 
00068   m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00069 
00070   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), props,
00071                                              &m_hyperspace_session_handler);
00072   uint32_t timeout = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.Timeout");
00073 
00074   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00075     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00076     exit(1);
00077   }
00078 
00079   m_verbose = props->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00080   uint16_t port = props->get_i16("Hypertable.Master.Port");
00081   m_max_range_bytes = props->get_i64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MaxBytes");
00082 
00086   DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props);
00087   timeout = props->get_i32("DfsBroker.Timeout");
00088 
00089   if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00090     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00091     exit(1);
00092   }
00093   m_dfs_client = dfs_client;
00094 
00095   atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, 0);
00096 
00097   if (!initialize())
00098     exit(1);
00099 
00100   /* Read Last Table ID */
00101   {
00102     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00103     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00104     int ival;
00105     uint32_t lock_status;
00106     uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00107 
00108     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", oflags,
00109                                                   null_handle_callback);
00110 
00111     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_master_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE,
00112                                &lock_status, &m_master_file_sequencer);
00113 
00114     if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00115       HT_ERROR("Unable to obtain lock on '/hypertable/master' - conflict");
00116       exit(1);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Write master location in 'address' attribute, format is IP:port
00120     InetAddr addr(System::net_info().primary_addr, port);
00121     String addr_s = addr.format();
00122     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "address",
00123                                addr_s.c_str(), addr_s.length());
00124 
00125     try {
00126       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", valbuf);
00127       ival = atoi((const char *)valbuf.base);
00128     }
00129     catch (Exception &e) {
00130       if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND) {
00131         m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", "0",
00132                                    2);
00133         ival = 0;
00134       }
00135       else
00136         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00137     }
00138 
00139     atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, ival);
00140     if (m_verbose)
00141       cout << "Last Table ID: " << ival << endl;
00142   }
00143 
00147   scan_servers_directory();
00148 
00149   master_gc_start(props, m_threads, m_metadata_table_ptr, m_dfs_client);
00150 }

00173 void Master::server_left(const String &location) {
00174   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00175   uint32_t lock_status;
00176   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00177   ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.find(location);
00178   String hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00179 
00180   if (iter == m_server_map.end()) {
00181     HT_WARNF("Server (%s) not found in map", location.c_str());
00182     return;
00183   }
00184 
00185   // if we're about to delete the item pointing to the server map iterator,
00186   // then advance the iterator
00187   if (iter == m_server_map_iter)
00188     ++m_server_map_iter;
00189 
00190   m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle,
00191       LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00192 
00193   if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00194     HT_INFOF("Unable to obtain lock on server file %s, ignoring...",
00195              location.c_str());
00196     return;
00197   }
00198 
00199   try {
00200     m_hyperspace_ptr->close((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle);
00201     m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00202   }
00203   catch (Exception &e) {
00204     HT_WARN_OUT "Problem closing file '" << hsfname << "' - " << e << HT_END;
00205   }
00206 
00207   m_server_map.erase(iter);
00208   if (m_server_map.empty())
00209     m_no_servers_cond.notify_all();
00210 
00211   HT_INFOF("RangeServer lost it's lock on file %s, deleting ...",
00212            hsfname.c_str());
00213   cout << flush;
00214 
00218 }

00226 Master::create_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *tablename,
00227                      const char *schemastr) {
00228 
00229   HT_INFO_OUT << "Entering create_table for " << tablename << HT_END;
00230 
00231   try {
00232     create_table(tablename, schemastr);
00233   }
00234   catch (Exception &e) {
00235     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00236     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00237     return;
00238   }
00239 
00240   cb->response_ok();
00241 }

00247 void Master::get_schema(ResponseCallbackGetSchema *cb, const char *tablename) {
00248   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00249   String errmsg;
00250   DynamicBuffer schemabuf(0);
00251   uint64_t handle;
00252   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00253 
00254   try {
00255 
00259     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile)) {
00260       cb->error(Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND, tablename);
00261       return;
00262     }
00263 
00267     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00268                                     null_handle_callback);
00269 
00273     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", schemabuf);
00274 
00275     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00276 
00277     cb->response((char *)schemabuf.base);
00278 
00279     if (m_verbose) {
00280       HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched schema (length=%d) for table '%s'",
00281                (int)strlen((char *)schemabuf.base), tablename);
00282     }
00283 
00284   }
00285   catch (Exception &e) {
00286     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00287     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00288   }
00289 }

00296 void
00297 Master::register_server(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *location,
00298                         const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00299   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00300   ServerMap::iterator iter;
00301   struct sockaddr_in alias;
00302   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00303   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00304   uint32_t lock_status;
00305   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00306   String hsfname;
00307   bool exists = false;
00308 
00309   try {
00310     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00311 
00312     HT_ASSERT((iter = m_server_map.find(location)) == m_server_map.end());
00313 
00314     rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00315     rs_state->location = location;
00316     rs_state->addr = addr;
00317 
00318     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(location, alias)) {
00319       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating address from location '%s'", location);
00320       cb->error(Error::INVALID_METADATA, (String)"Unable to convert location '"
00321                 + location + "' to address");
00322       return;
00323     }
00324     else {
00325       Comm *comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00326       comm->set_alias(addr, alias);
00327     }
00328 
00329     hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00330 
00331     lock_file_handler =
00332         new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00333 
00334     rs_state->hyperspace_handle =
00335         m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00336 
00337     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle,
00338         LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00339 
00340     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00341       HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...",
00342                hsfname.c_str());
00343       m_hyperspace_ptr->release(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00344       m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00345       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00346       cb->error(Error::MASTER_FILE_NOT_LOCKED, format("Server file '%s' "
00347                 "not locked", hsfname.c_str()));
00348       return;
00349     }
00350     else
00351       m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00352 
00353     HT_INFOF("Server Registered %s -> %s", location,
00354              InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00355 
00356     cb->response_ok();
00357 
00358   }
00359   catch (Exception &e) {
00360     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00361     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00362     return;
00363   }
00364 
00368   if (!m_initialized) {
00369     TableIdentifier table;
00370     RangeSpec range;
00371     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00372 
00376     {
00377       String metadata_schema_file = System::install_dir + "/conf/METADATA.xml";
00378       off_t schemalen;
00379       const char *schemastr =
00380           FileUtils::file_to_buffer(metadata_schema_file.c_str(), &schemalen);
00381 
00382       try {
00383         create_table("METADATA", schemastr);
00384       }
00385       catch (Exception &e) {
00386         if (e.code() != Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS) {
00387           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00388           HT_ABORT;
00389         }
00390         exists = true;
00391       }
00392     }
00393 
00397     m_metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr,
00398         m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00399 
00400     // If table exists, then ranges should already have been assigned
00401     if (exists) {
00402       m_initialized = true;
00403       return;
00404     }
00405 
00406     m_metadata_table_ptr->get_identifier(&table);
00407     table.name = "METADATA";
00408 
00412     range.start_row = 0;
00413     range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00414 
00415     try {
00416       RangeState range_state;
00417       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00418       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00419     }
00420     catch (Exception &e) {
00421       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server "
00422                 "%s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00423                 InetAddr::format(alias).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00424     }
00425 
00426 
00431     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00432     KeySpec key;
00433     String metadata_key_str;
00434 
00435     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00436 
00437     metadata_key_str = String("0:") + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00438     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00439     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00440     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00441     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00442 
00443     try {
00444       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00445       mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)Key::END_ROOT_ROW,
00446                        strlen(Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00447       mutator_ptr->flush();
00448     }
00449     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00450       // TODO: propagate exception
00451       HT_ERRORF("METADATA update error (row_key = %s) - %s : %s",
00452                 metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00453       exit(1);
00454     }
00455 
00459     range.start_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00460     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00461 
00462     try {
00463       RangeState range_state;
00464       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00465       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00466     }
00467     catch (Exception &e) {
00468       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server "
00469                 "%s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00470                 InetAddr::format(alias).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00471     }
00472 
00473     m_initialized = true;
00474   }
00475 
00476 }
00477 
00484 void
00485 Master::report_split(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier &table,
00486     const RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00487   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00488   RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00489 
00490   HT_INFOF("Entering report_split for %s[%s:%s].", table.name, range.start_row,
00491            range.end_row);
00492 
00493   {
00494     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00495     if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00496       m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00497     assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00498     memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr),
00499            sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00500     HT_INFOF("Assigning newly reported range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name,
00501              range.start_row, range.end_row,
00502              (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00503     ++m_server_map_iter;
00504   }
00505 
00506   //cb->get_address(addr);
00507 
00508   try {
00509     RangeState range_state;
00510     range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00511     rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, transfer_log_dir, range_state, 0);
00512     HT_INFOF("report_split for %s[%s:%s] successful.", table.name,
00513              range.start_row, range.end_row);
00514   }
00515   catch (Exception &e) {
00516     HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[%s:%s] at server "
00517               "%s - %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row,
00518               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00519     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00520   }
00521 
00522   cb->response_ok();
00523 
00524 }

00526 void
00527 Master::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *table_name,
00528                    bool if_exists) {
00529   int saved_error = Error::OK;
00530   String err_msg;
00531   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_name;
00532   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00533   int ival;
00534   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00535   uint64_t handle;
00536   String table_name_str = table_name;
00537 
00538   HT_INFOF("Entering drop_table for %s", table_name);
00539   std::cout << flush;
00540 
00541   try {
00542 
00546     try {
00547       handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00548                                       null_handle_callback);
00549     }
00550     catch (Exception &e) {
00551       if (if_exists && e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME) {
00552         cb->response_ok();
00553         return;
00554       }
00555       HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem opening file '%s'", table_file.c_str());
00556     }
00557 
00558     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00559 
00560     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00561 
00562     ival = atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00563 
00564     {
00565       char start_row[16];
00566       char end_row[16];
00567       TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00568       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00569       Cell cell;
00570       String location_str;
00571       std::set<String> unique_locations;
00572       TableIdentifier table;
00573       RowInterval ri;
00574 
00575       table.name = table_name_str.c_str();
00576       table.id = ival;
00577       table.generation = 0;
00578 
00579       sprintf(start_row, "%d:", ival);
00580       sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", ival, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00581 
00582       scan_spec.row_limit = 0;
00583       scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00584       scan_spec.columns.clear();
00585       scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00586 
00587       ri.start = start_row;
00588       ri.end = end_row;
00589       scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00590 
00591       int max_wait=5;
00592 
00593       while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00594         poll(0, 0, 1000);
00595         max_wait--;
00596       }
00597 
00598       if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00599         HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS,
00600                  "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00601 
00602       scanner_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00603 
00604       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00605         location_str = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00606         boost::trim(location_str);
00607         if (location_str != "" && location_str != "!")
00608           unique_locations.insert(location_str);
00609       }
00610 
00611       if (!unique_locations.empty()) {
00612         DropTableDispatchHandler sync_handler(table,
00613             m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00614         RangeServerStatePtr state_ptr;
00615         ServerMap::iterator iter;
00616 
00617         {
00618           ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00619           for (std::set<String>::iterator loc_iter = unique_locations.begin();
00620                loc_iter != unique_locations.end(); ++loc_iter) {
00621             if ((iter = m_server_map.find(*loc_iter)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00622               sync_handler.add((*iter).second->addr);
00623             }
00624             else {
00625               saved_error = Error::RANGESERVER_UNAVAILABLE;
00626               err_msg = *loc_iter;
00627             }
00628           }
00629         }
00630 
00631         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00632           std::vector<DropTableDispatchHandler::ErrorResult> errors;
00633           sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00634           for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00635             HT_WARNF("drop table error - %s - %s", errors[i].msg.c_str(),
00636                      Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00637           }
00638           cb->error(errors[0].error, errors[0].msg);
00639           return;
00640         }
00641       }
00642 
00643     }
00644 
00645     if (saved_error != Error::OK) {
00646       HT_ERRORF("DROP TABLE failed '%s' - %s", err_msg.c_str(),
00647                 Error::get_text(saved_error));
00648       cb->error(saved_error, err_msg);
00649       return;
00650     }
00651     else {
00652       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(table_file.c_str());
00653     }
00654 
00655     HT_INFOF("DROP TABLE '%s' id=%d success", table_name_str.c_str(), ival);
00656     cb->response_ok();
00657     cout << flush;
00658 
00659   }
00660   catch (Exception &e) {
00661     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00662     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00663   }
00664 }
00665 
00666   void Master::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00667     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00668 
00669     HT_INFO("SHUTDOWN");
00670     std::cout << endl;
00671 
00672     {
00673       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00674       boost::xtime expire_time;
00675 
00676       // issue shutdown commands
00677       for (ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.begin();
00678            iter != m_server_map.end(); ++iter)
00679         rsc.shutdown((*iter).second->addr);
00680 
00681       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00682       expire_time.sec += (int64_t)30;
00683 
00684       m_no_servers_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time);
00685       if (!m_server_map.empty()) {
00686         String err_msg = format("%d RangeServers failed to shutdown",
00687                                 (int)m_server_map.size());
00688         cb->error(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, err_msg);
00689         return;
00690       }
00691 
00692       m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
00693     }
00694 
00695     cb->response_ok();
00696 
00697     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00698 
00699     _exit(0);
00700 
00701   }
00702 
00703 
00704 void
00705 Master::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr) {
00706   String finalschema = "";
00707   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00708   string table_basedir;
00709   string agdir;
00710   Schema *schema = 0;
00711   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00712   uint64_t handle;
00713   uint32_t table_id;
00714 
00718   if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile))
00719     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS, tablename);
00720 
00724   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemastr, strlen(schemastr));
00725   if (!schema->is_valid())
00726     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00727 
00728   schema->assign_ids();
00729   schema->render(finalschema);
00730   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"schema:\n"<< finalschema << HT_END;
00731 
00735   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile,
00736       OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00737 
00742   {
00743     char numbuf[16];
00744     if (!strcmp(tablename, "METADATA")) {
00745       table_id = 0;
00746       sprintf(numbuf, "%u", table_id);
00747       cout << "table id = " << numbuf << endl;
00748     }
00749     else {
00750       table_id = (uint32_t)atomic_inc_return(&m_last_table_id);
00751       sprintf(numbuf, "%u", table_id);
00752       cout << "table id = " << numbuf << endl;
00753       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id",
00754                                  numbuf, strlen(numbuf)+1);
00755     }
00756 
00757     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "table_id", numbuf, strlen(numbuf)+1);
00758   }
00759 
00763   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "schema", finalschema.c_str(),
00764                              finalschema.length());
00765 
00766   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00767 
00772   table_basedir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename + "/";
00773 
00774   foreach(const Schema::AccessGroup *ag, schema->get_access_groups()) {
00775     agdir = table_basedir + ag->name;
00776     m_dfs_client->mkdirs(agdir);
00777   }
00778 
00782   if (table_id != 0) {
00783     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00784     KeySpec key;
00785     String metadata_key_str;
00786     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00787     int max_wait=5;
00788 
00789     while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00790       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00791       max_wait--;
00792     }
00793 
00794     if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00795       HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS,
00796                "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00797 
00798     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00799 
00800     metadata_key_str = String("") + table_id + ":" + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00801     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00802     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00803     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00804     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00805 
00806     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00807     mutator_ptr->set(key, 0, 0);
00808     mutator_ptr->flush();
00809 
00814     TableIdentifier table;
00815     RangeSpec range;
00816     uint64_t soft_limit;
00817     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00818 
00819     table.name = tablename;
00820     table.id = table_id;
00821     table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00822 
00823     range.start_row = 0;
00824     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00825 
00826     {
00827       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00828       if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00829         m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00830       assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00831       memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr),
00832              sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00833       HT_INFOF("Assigning first range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name,
00834           range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00835       ++m_server_map_iter;
00836       soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes / std::min(64, (int)m_server_map.size()*2);
00837     }
00838 
00839     try {
00840       RangeState range_state;
00841       range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00842       rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, 0, range_state);
00843     }
00844     catch (Exception &e) {
00845       String err_msg = format("Problem issuing 'load range' command for "
00846           "%s[..%s] at server %s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00847           InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00848       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, err_msg);
00849     }
00850   }
00851 
00852   if (m_verbose) {
00853     HT_INFOF("Successfully created table '%s' ID=%d", tablename, table_id);
00854   }
00855 
00856 }
00857 
00858 
00863 bool Master::initialize() {
00864   uint64_t handle;
00865   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00866 
00867   try {
00868 
00869     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable")) {
00870       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable"))
00871         return false;
00872     }
00873 
00874     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers")) {
00875       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/servers"))
00876         return false;
00877     }
00878 
00879     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/tables")) {
00880       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/tables"))
00881         return false;
00882     }
00883 
00884     // Create /hypertable/master if necessary
00885     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master",
00886         OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00887     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00888 
00892     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root",
00893         OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00894     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00895 
00896     HT_INFO("Successfully Initialized Hypertable.");
00897 
00898     return true;
00899 
00900   }
00901   catch (Exception &e) {
00902     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00903     return false;
00904   }
00905 }
00906 
00907 
00911 void Master::scan_servers_directory() {
00912   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00913   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00914   std::vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00915   uint32_t lock_status;
00916   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00917   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00918   uint32_t oflags;
00919   String hsfname;
00920 
00921   try {
00922 
00926     m_servers_dir_callback_ptr =
00927         new ServersDirectoryHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00928 
00929     m_servers_dir_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/servers",
00930         OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_servers_dir_callback_ptr);
00931 
00932     m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(m_servers_dir_handle, listing);
00933 
00934     oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00935 
00936     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00937 
00938       rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00939       rs_state->location = listing[i].name;
00940 
00941       hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + listing[i].name;
00942 
00943       lock_file_handler =
00944           new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00945 
00946       rs_state->hyperspace_handle =
00947           m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00948 
00949       m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle,
00950           LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00951 
00952       if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00953         HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...",
00954                  hsfname.c_str());
00955         m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00956         m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00957       }
00958       else {
00959         m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00960       }
00961     }
00962   }
00963   catch (Exception &e) {
00964     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00965     HT_ABORT;
00966   }
00967 }
00968 
00969 
00973 bool Master::create_hyperspace_dir(const String &dir) {
00974 
00975   try {
00976 
00977     if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(dir))
00978       return true;
00979 
00980     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir(dir);
00981 
00982   }
00983   catch (Exception &e) {
00984     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem creating hyperspace directory '" << dir << "'"
00985         << HT_END;
00986     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00987     return false;
00988   }
00989 
00990   return true;
00991 }
00992 
00993 void Master::join() {
00994   m_app_queue_ptr->join();
00995   m_threads.join_all();
00996 }
